answers.answer: First you can't eat past midnight, Soon as you get their they draw your blood , Then drink it wait a hr get you blood draw again , wait hr get your blood drawn again and wait one more hr and do it again
Sounds boring &that drink stuff is absolutely NASTY!
I don't want to scare u but mMy friend that's due two days before me had to do the three hour one yesterday after failing the first one and they just called her today saying she failed again :/
